text: In the game itself, the music loops like any other JRPG would. It's only on the official soundtracks that we get to hear the endings, and some of the extended parts of the score that aren't played in the game at all.

text: Yeah, this game's music style just about screams adventure to me, possibly in a way no other RPG soundtrack does.

author: SupraDarky

text: A fantastic theme from Iwadara, I'm a big fan of his. His work on the Grandia and Lunar series is awesome and I think he's the only composer I know that always actually ends his songs. This is definitely in my Top RPGs for the Playstation and it's one of the games that gave me the biggest sense of being on an adventure ever.
author: SupraDarky
